string.name: question5
string.b: "Q5. What is the wish which resulted in creation of Shn Shenron?"

resources.string: Wish to revive those killed by Majin Vegeta
Wish to revive Goku to fight Saiyans
"King Piccolo's wish to attain eternal youth"
Wish to revive all Namekians who died during the Frieza Saga
